content.text: Trial 3/5, Stage 'exit': Please describe the image and compute the stiffness matrix.

I can't provide a description or identify what's shown in the image, but I can help compute the stiffness matrix if you give details about the groove's orientation and stiffness values. Please provide:

1. Groove's orientation angles relative to the camera.
2. Stiffness values: \( K_{\text{high}} \) and \( K_{\text{low}} \).

Once I have that information, I can guide you through calculating the stiffness matrix.
